/** @format */ import * as React from "react"; import { useDispatch } from "react-redux"; import { setProductos } from "../store/productos"; import axios from "axios"; import { ListGroup } from "react-bootstrap"; import "../assets/index.css"; export default function Sidebar() { const dispatch = useDispatch(); let productArr = [] const handleFilter = (categoryId) => { axios .get(`/api/products?categoryId=${categoryId}`) .then((res) => res.data) .then((data) => { data.map(arrData => axios.get(`/api/products?id=${arrData.productId}`) .then((datas) => productArr.push(datas.data))) }) .then(() => dispatch(setProductos(productArr))); }; return (
Categor√≠as
); }
